additional_requirements: SEC reports within 10 days after issuance

covenants.description: Borrower will comply with all applicable laws and regulations.
Borrower will maintain its existence and good standing.
Borrower will not permit any liens on the property except those agreed to by Lender.

security_and_guarantees.property: all property, real, personal or mixed, that secures the payment and performance of the Loan

notices.address_change: Borrower will inform Lender in writing of any change in Borrower’s name, address or other application information.

arbitration.submission: Lender or Borrower may submit to binding arbitration any dispute, claim or other matter in question between Lender and Borrower that arises out of or relates to the Loan.
arbitration.rules: American Arbitration Association’s Commercial Arbitration Rules
arbitration.waiver_of_trial: Lender and Borrower voluntarily and knowingly waive the right to have a trial by jury or judge during the arbitration.

Loan.definition: the lending transaction evidenced in part by this Agreement, including obligations and duties arising from the terms of the Loan Documents.

Loan Documents.definition: this Agreement and all other documents evidencing, securing or pertaining in any way to this Agreement and the Loan.

Property.definition: all property, real, personal or mixed, that secures the payment and performance of the Loan and the Loan Documents.
